content: *beautiful set to crochet for baby with matching cardigan bonnet and booties truly a keepsake crocheted in bernat softee baby bernat com * skill level intermediate finished chest measurement 6 mos 20 ins / 51 cm 12 mos 22½ / 57 cm bernat softee baby 5 oz 140 g 2000 - white **cardigan** 6 mos 3½ oz 98 g 319 yds 292 m or 1 ball 12 mos 4¼ oz 120 g 390 yds 357 m or 1 ball sizes 3 00 mm u s c or 2 and 3 50 mm u s e or 4 crochet hooks 4 buttons for cardigan cardigan body is worked in one piece to armholes design features picot edging finishing sew in sleeves sew sleeve seams sew on buttons to correspond to buttonholes construction schematics are included in pdf download *ed note pattern can be adapted for boys or girls reverse buttons/buttonholes * other items in the set bonnet 1 booties 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lacy-set-to-crochet-bonnet 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lacy-set-to-crochet-booties
